Class Game.MasterSettings

java.lang.Object
resources.Settings
gamedata.Game.MasterSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<String>
Enclosing class:

public static final class Game.MasterSettings extends Settings
The class of all settings instances returned from Game.getMasterSettings().

  • Method Details

    • set

      public void set​(String key, String value)
      Sets the value of a key at this scope.

      The master settings instance for a game will not allow you to change the value of the key with the name Game.GAME_SETTING_KEY.

      Overrides:
      set in class Settings
      Parameters:
      key - the key to whose value at this scope should be changed
      value - the value to set for this scope
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key is the Game.GAME_SETTING_KEY and the value is not equal to the code for the game for which this is a master settings instance

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Description copied from class: Settings
      Returns a string that describes this settings instance.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Settings
      Returns:
      a description of the settings scope
